str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To rescue, deliver (from danger or destruction).
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
(lit: out of place, unusual, unbecoming), improper, unrighteous, perverse. Out of place, i.e. improper, injurious, wicked.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
